speaker: CLINTON
sentence: And as I have said and as now has come out, my predecessors did the same thing and many other people in the government.
politifact_statement: Did Clintons predecessors follow the same email practices?
verified_claim: Regarding her State Department email practices, "my predecessors did the same thing."
verified_claim_article_title: Hillary Clinton said 'my predecessors did the same thing' with em

speaker: SANDERS
sentence: Well, when we talk about efforts to assist immigrants, Secretary Clinton prevailed upon the governor of New York, Elliot Spitzer, who wanted to do the right thing and provide driver's license to these who were undocumented, she said don't do it, and New York State still does not do it.
politifact_statement: Clinton and drivers licenses for undocumented immigrants
verified_claim: When New York Gov. Eliot Spitzer wanted to "provide drivers licenses to those who are undocumented. Hillary Clinton said dont do it."
verified_claim_article_title: Bernie Sanders says that Hillary Clinton opposed driver's licenses for illegal immigrants  PolitiFact Florid

speaker: SANDERS
sentence: And I said welcome those children into this country, Secretary Clinton said send them back.
politifact_statement: Sanders Clinton wanted to send back Honduran children
verified_claim: When Honduran children came into this country, "Secretary Clinton said send them back."
verified_claim_article_title: Sanders said Clinton backed return for undocumented kids

speaker: SANDERS
sentence: If you look at Latino kids between 17 and 20 who graduated high school, 36 percent of them are unemployed or underemployed...
